title: Post-independence health research productivity in Portuguese-speaking African countries: A bibliometric analysis of 43 years of research and higher education in Mozambique
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Assucênio Chissaque, Esperança Guimarães, Cesar H. Limaymanta, Carolina Conjo, Bettencourt Preto Sebastião Capece, Luzia Gonçalves, Nilsa de Deus, Isabel Craveiro
